about_the_game:
Modelist is a VR Model Kits building & playing game.
Build, Paint and Experience each Model and its unique Gameplay!

Build
Manipulate, assemble and discover information about every part of the model kit. No need to separate the parts from the matrix, or use glue and get dirty! We use the power of Virtual Reality to bring you a smooth model kit building experience!

Paint
You can fully customize the look of your model using paint, decals, or textures. Be it a stealthy livery, or a cartoon skin, explore the different tools to bring your craziest ideas to life!

Experience
You can hop in the pilot seat of every model that you built and experience it first hand! Every model has its specific controls, gameplay, and missions to enjoy.

name: Modelist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Modelist is a VR Model Kits building & playing game. Build, Paint and Experience each Model and its unique Gameplay!
